setting.location: Personal quarters aboard research station orbiting planet Solaris
setting.weather: Cold artificial atmosphere with emergency systems activated

characters.clothing: Station uniform partially on, grabbed hastily in emergency

characters.action: Staring in horror at impossible sight, retching from visceral revulsion, entire body trembling with psychological trauma

characters.appearance: Woman, late 20s, dark hair, body in impossible state of destruction and reconstruction
characters.clothing: Nightgown, unnaturally positioned during impossible physical process
characters.position: Center of room in unnatural physical state defying human biology

scene.mainElements: Small quarters transformed into scene of impossible body horror, normal domestic space violated by supernatural physical impossibility
scene.details: Emergency lighting activated casting harsh shadows, evidence of impossible physical trauma that regenerates perfectly, station equipment continuing normal function despite horror, no text or letters visible
scene.background: Station architecture unchanged but feeling hostile, porthole showing alien planet that seems more menacing, technological environment offering no comfort against supernatural horror
scene.atmosphere: Complete psychological breakdown from witnessing impossible body horror, violation of all natural laws, visceral terror at seeing human form destroyed and restored, reality becoming completely untrustworthy

composition.cameraAngle: Wide shot capturing both horror and witness
composition.focus: Contrast between impossible physical event and human psychological collapse
composition.depth: Horrified witness pressed against wall in foreground, impossible event in center middle ground, normal station background emphasizing surreal violation
